channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Southwest Can’t Gentle-Parent Loyal Customers Like Me Into Accepting Its Self-Destruction
item.description: For decades, SWA prided itself on being more than a business. Now, it’s choosing to die on the hill of sacrificing its customers for profit.
